org.gradoop.flink.model.impl.operators.statistics.functions

Class AggregateListOfWccVertices

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gradoop.flink.model.impl.operators.statistics.functions.AggregateListOfWccVertices
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, AggregateFunction, VertexAggregateFunction

    public class AggregateListOfWccVertices
extends Object
implements VertexAggregateFunction
    Aggregates the connected component ids from all vertices as list of propertyValues.
    See Also:
